description: A delicious, rich, creamy chicken stroganoff with a beautiful smokey flavour. Accompanied with buttery cabbage and apple, just perfect for winter.
keywords: Stroganoff,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Apple,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Chicken Stroganoff w Sauteed Cabbage & Apple Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 granny smith apple, peeled, finely sliced (for cabbage)

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. One large non stick Pot for Stroganoff and a large flat Pan for Cabbage are required

Into the large non stick Pot on high heat, add one teaspoon of Oil, once heated, add half the Chicken.Cook stirring occasionally for 3 minutes or until Chicken is golden brown and cooked through.Remove to a plate and repeat with the last of the Chicken.
Add remaining Oil, reduce heat to medium, add Onion, Garlic and Mushrooms, cook stirring for 5 minutes or until Veggies are softened.
Add both Paprika's, stir to combine and cook for a minute or until fragrant.
Return Chicken (and any juices) to the Pot, along with Tomato Paste, Dijon Mustard, Worcestershire Sauce, Sour Cream and a good grinding of Pepper, stir to combine.
Reduce heat to simmer, lid on, simmer for about 8 minutes or until Mushrooms are tender.Check Seasoning.

CABBAGE INSTRUCTIONS - Meanwhile whilst Chicken is simmering, heat Butter in the large flat pan on medium/high heat, add Cabbage (it seems a lot, but does cook down) saute for about 5 minutes or until softened slightly, add Apple and saute for a further 3 minutes or until Cabbage and Apple are cooked, season with Salt & Pepper - serve immediately and enjoy.
